name: The Acorn Bandits (Great Autumn Game Jam 2021 Entry)
name_original: The Acorn Bandits (Great Autumn Game Jam 2021 Entry)
description:
The Cat Bandits have stolen your town's acorns and defeated the Squirrel Patrol! It's upto Sharpbeak the Bird to save the day and get back the stolen acorns.

First Game Jam! I was late to the party so I didn't have much time to work on it. Expect some jank and bugs. 

Would love all feedback, good and bad.
